attributes.action: Do not make children wear face masks in school or in class
attributes.additional_details: There is plethora information on the negative effects of wearing face masks and much science showing how little they do to prevent disease. Children should not have to wear a mask for six hours a day for an indefinite period- this is a deplorable attack on children, their health, education and freedom.
attributes.background: I want the government to withdraw this from the plan to reopen schools and to ensure children are able to be educated un encumbered by face masks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576843
